author: Warhammer
description:
Feast of Grimnir is a brand new, limited time, annually recurring event. This year’s event begins August 26 and will last until September 14. For the duration of the event, the new event level, ‘The Feast of Grimnir’, will be accessible via the Weekly Event Game Mode. Play the level to complete event specific Okri’s quests and unlock rewards!

title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Feast of Grimnir | Release Trailer

author: Warhammer
description:
Weathering is a great way to enhance your miniatures and works for even the smallest of vehicles. Follow Dan as he tackles how to add battle damage to the tiniest of tanks, with techniques that can also be used on any miniature in your collection! 

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Wyldwood

Base:
Mournfang Brown
Rhinox Hide

Layer:
Deepkin Flesh
Dorn Yellow

Technical:
Lahmian Medium

Tools:
Small Drybrush
Small Layer Brush
Small Layer STC Brush
Medium Shade STC Brush

If you enjoyed this and want to learn more, our YouTube channel has an array of beginner-friendly videos to get you started.

title: Weathering Extra Small Mastodons | Warhammer: The Horus Heresy – Legions Imperialis
